main.description: Synchronize key packages between client and server to prevent NoMatchingKeyPackage errors. Compares server-side available key packages against client-provided local hashes and deletes orphaned server packages that no longer have corresponding private keys on the device. MULTI-DEVICE: deviceId is REQUIRED - only syncs packages for that specific device to prevent cross-device interference.

localHashes.description: SHA256 hex hashes of key packages that exist in local storage (have private keys)

deviceId.description: Device ID to scope the sync (REQUIRED). Only syncs key packages belonging to this device. This is the deviceId returned from registerDevice.

serverHashes.description: SHA256 hex hashes of available (unconsumed) key packages on server AFTER cleanup

orphanedCount.description: Number of orphaned key packages detected (on server but not in local storage)

deletedCount.description: Number of orphaned key packages successfully deleted

orphanedHashes.description: Hashes of orphaned packages that were deleted (for debugging)

remainingAvailable.description: Number of valid key packages remaining after cleanup

deviceId.description: Device ID that was synced (echoed back for confirmation)
